text: :  6 . ,  . English teacher  native speaker for primary school. A private upper-market prep school/primary school located in the Northwestern Moscow region in an affluent neighborhood is looking for a English teacher. Please only apply if English is your first language. Education: Bachelor or equivalent in Children Education or Psychology. Experience required: 5 years minimum. ESL certification required. Medical certification required. Responsibilities: Children are 9-10 years old in groups of 6-8.30 academic hours per week. Conditions: Working hours are 8.30 to 17.30, Mon-Fri. There are four weeks paid vacation time. Compensation package: 220 000 Russian roubles net, meals, transportation to and from work to metro station Strogino, visa expenses.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614aac6bcf366611016b7e0e::headhunter_ru", "source": "headhunter_ru", "country": "RU", "company": "Гусенок на Новой Риге", "position": "English teacher/native speaker", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: более 6 лет

Полная занятость, полный день

English teacher — native speaker for primary school.

A private upper-market prep school/primary school located in the Northwestern Moscow region in an affluent neighborhood is looking for a English teacher. Please only apply if English is your first language.

Education:

  • Bachelor or equivalent in Children Education or Psychology.
  • Experience required: 5 years minimum.
  • ESL certification required. Medical certification required.


Responsibilities:

  • Children are 9-10 years old in groups of 6-8.
  • 30 academic hours per week.

Conditions:

  • Working hours are 8.30 to 17.30, Mon-Fri.
  • There are four weeks paid vacation time.
  • Compensation package: 220 000 Russian roubles net, meals, transportation to and from work to metro station Strogino, visa expenses.

Адрес

коттеджный поселок Никольская Слобода
Показать на большой карте
"}
